blocks.main_tooltip: All actions should be placed inside this block.
blocks.math_sum_tooltip: Adds numbers. You can click the '+' icon to add more inputs.
blocks.math_multiply_tooltip: Multiplies numbers. Click the multiply sign to add more inputs.
blocks.power_tooltip: Calculates base raised to the power of exponent. For example: 2^3 = 8
blocks.text_check_tooltip: Checks whether the text contains a specific substring.
blocks.text_length_tooltip: Returns the number of characters in the text.
